    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1300</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Return to Hebron - June, 1967</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Rückkehr bis Hebron - Juni, 1967</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le retour à Hebron - juin, 1967</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O retorno a Hebron - junho, 1967</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il ritorno a Hebron - giugno, del 1967</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επιστροφή μέχρι σε Χεβρώνα - τον Ιούνιο, του 1967</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vuelta a Hebron - junio de 1967</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This page tells the story of Rabbi Shlomo Goren - the first Israeli in Hebron and in the Cave of the Machpela during the Six Day War (1967) .</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Communities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jewish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Goren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Shlomo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rabbi Hebron (Israel)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Seite erklärt die Geschichte des 
Rabbiners Shlomo Goren - der erste Israeli in Hebron und in der 
Höhle des Machpela während des sechs Tages War (1967).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette page indique l'histoire de Rabbin 
Shlomo Goren - le premier Israélien dans Hebron et dans la 
caverne du Machpela pendant six le jour War (1967).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta página diz a história do rabbi Shlomo 
Goren - primeiro israeli em Hebron e na caverna do Machpela durante 
seis o dia Guerra (1967).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa pagina dice alla storia del rabbi Shlomo 
Goren - il primo israeliano in Hebron e nella caverna del Machpela 
durante sei il giorno War (1967).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σελίδα λέει την ιστορία του ραβίνου Shlomo 
Goren - ο πρώτος Ισραηλίτης σε Χεβρώνα και στη σπηλιά του 
Machpela κατά τη διάρκεια του πολέμου έξι ημερών (1967).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta paginación cuenta la historia del 
Rabino Shlomo Goren - el primer israelí en Hebron y en la cueva 
del Machpela durante seises el día War (1967).</string>
          </description>
